All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
Actor
Abstract Actor class contains intersection logic and timer, this class is used as an extension for other classes
Animal
Animal class is an extension of actor class containing death logic, death animation, hitbox detection, movement and player positioning
The Animal class is usually instantiated by the Levels class, this is to create a player controlled charater for the player
BackgroundImage
BackgroundImage class contains methods to create a 600x800 pixel background
Digit
Digit class contains a constructor to display individual number images from a preset directory
End
End class contains a constructor to create goal areas with images
EndMenu
EndMenu class contains methods and constructors for highscore displaying, highscore entering and pop-up windows
Icon
Icon class contains a constructor to create small images to be added to the game window as icons
Levels
Contains methods and constructors to start a level, key listeners, level progression detection, number positioning and word positioning
Levels class is instantiated inside the MainMenu class
Log
Log class contains methods and constructors to display a moving log platform with a specified image
Main
Main class starts the game by instantiating the MainMenu class
MainMenu
MainMenu class contains methods and constructors of a main menu
MyStage
MyStage class contains methods for music selection, music playing and music pausing
Obstacle
Obstacle class contains a constructor and method for obstacle image and movement
Turtle
Turtle class contains methods and a constructor for turtle spawning, turtle movement and turtle animation controller
WetTurtle
WetTurtle class contains methods and a constructor for wet turtle spawning, wet turtle movement and wet turtle animation controller
Word
Word class contains a constructor to display individual alphabet images from a preset directory
World
World class contains key listeners, Actor class addition/deletion and timers
